description: This app allows you to interact with Tenable.SC. The app allows actions such as asset list updates etc.

inputs.description: This should be the ip or dns address of the Tenable.SC
inputs.name: server

inputs.description: This should be the username you would use to log into Tenable.SC
inputs.name: username

inputs.description: This should be the password you would use to log into Tenable.SC
inputs.name: password

inputs.description: This will be the action you make to take within Tenable.SC
inputs.name: action

inputs.description: This will be variable data passed to the function based on the action
inputs.name: data1

inputs.description: This will be variable data passed to the function based on the action
inputs.name: data2
